entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Concurrency issue with .NET 7 preview 5 #70940
  • Expression.ToString() does not show milliseconds for DateTime properties #70935
  • dotnet pack replaces wildcard version of reference with current actual version #70933
  • NativeAOT: Failed to compile virtual statics with default implementation #70930
  • Uri.IsWellFormedUriString false negative #70929
  • Inconsistent internal field handling between `JsonSourceGenerationMode`s #70928
  • Type.Missing doesn't convert to nullable enum in Method.Invoke #70925

Closed

  • `Process.Modules` does not list all modules/shared objects of a target process when executed on Linux #70904
  • [API Proposal]: `ProcessModule.Symbols()` #70380
    Future
  • NativeAOT - Massive failures #70889
  • Performance gap in ImmutableArray loop from sorting the builder #70927
  • [wasm] Blazor AOT in Azure DevOps Pipeline timing out after one hour #69479
    7.0.0
  • Box helpers do not handle null-valued managed pointers #70268
    7.0.0
  • ETW event Method/LoadVerbose contains wrong method signature for methods receiving function pointer (C#9) #60829
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix nullable annotations on MailAddress.TryCreate #70943
    area-System.Net
  • Update ValueStringBuilder grow logic #70942
  • R2R -> instrumented tier0 -> optimized tier1 #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make SuperPMI more explicit about JIT in error messages #70938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: add ability to filter during collection #70937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix loop alignment issue #70936
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try fewer call spills #70932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix reordering of call args on x86 #70931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Avoid inflating methods with instantiation with a wrong a… #70926
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Collections contain stale object IDs #70924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix arm64 funclet frame type 5 #70922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • superpmi.py: Add `-jitoption` for asmdiffs #70939
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some dead code / branches #70146
    area-Meta
  • Enable lib tests that used to fail with GC issues #70831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use u8 in a few more places #70894
    area-Meta
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Append the function pointer type #70923
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in a couple more places #70897
    area-System.DirectoryServices

Updated

  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add CreateChained rate limiter API #70739
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Allow ValueListBuilder to work with empty scratch spans #70917
    area-System.Collections
  • Enable IDE0065 (Misplaced using directive) #70919
    area-System.Xml
  • Disable W^X on macOS under Rosetta emulation #70912
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generic compilation to Crossgen2 #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add AddSystemd() and AddWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on x86 #70779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Run optRedundantBranches twice and try to compute more accurate doms #70907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Generalize init block morphing a little #70899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimization. Use Min/Max intrinsics if one of arguments is constant. #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • JIT: arm64 osr funclet frame probing #70916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Do not generate impossible instantiations for constrained generics in Mono AOT #70838
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [QUIC] Removes abstract providers and mock from S.N.Quic #70421
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][wasm] Add a minimal version of gsharedvt for llvmonly, enabled… #70867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Pass CancellationToken to Http2Connection SetupAsync #70906
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: handle case where we are cloning adjacent sibling loops #70874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Windows/Arm64: Use 8.1 atomic instructions if they are available #70921
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Performance measurement #1911
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Fix ILSpy.ReadyToRun disassembling #1910
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Fix R2RDump to dump the hot cold map #1909
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Fix R2RDump to support dumping hot-cold parts together #1908
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Make sure the debugger work under hot cold splitting #1907
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Conditional hot-cold mapping generation. #1906
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] GCStress testing #1905
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Optimize the exception processing to avoid repeated hot-cold mapping lookup #1904
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Redesign the hot cold mapping data structure to allow fast lookup #1903
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Pack the cold unwind data together #1902
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Generate the cold code in the proper session for Unix. #1901

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial hot cold splitting support for crossgen2/VM #1900

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Build failed with exception #26060

Updated

  • dotnet test fails on sdk 6.0.200 - System.AccessViolationException #24124
  • `dotnet sln add` can create parent solution folders when adding existing projects #26064
  • Failure to publish WASM when project source path contains blank spaces - Post-upgrade VS 2022 to 17.2.4 #26061

PullRequests

Updated

  • Razor SG: Don't produce anything when suppressed #26084
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected CS0529 and CS0146 #62006
  • Internal setters in interfaces are required to be public in implementing types #62005

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use native azdo command for checkout #61965
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix deadlock during the startup of diagnostics #62001
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62009
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62010
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #62008
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #62007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify implementation of the FindRefsCache helper type #61941
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Do not show name suggestions after event name #61807
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Shadow Copy all analyzer dependencies #61974
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Add analyzers to unnecessary nullable directives #62004
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the load time performance of Blazor WebAssembly apps on low-end mobile devices #42284
  • Web Assembly Prerender Not Rendered #42280
  • Is the IsReusable property of the ModelStateInvalidFilter class necessary? #42279
  • can't deploy .net 7 preview 5 to iis(win server2012) #42274
  • Github actions CI blocked on MacOS #42273
  • AsParameters support in MVC #42271

Closed

  • Add Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly to the aspnetcore shared framework and ref pack. #42282
  • Blazor InputFile doesn't notice user cancellation #29979
    7.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Reference to component (@ref) is set after entire container is rendered #42239
  • Blazor Wasm Publish Error: error MSB6006: "C:\Program Files\dotnet" exited with code 1. since VS 17.2.4 update #42262
  • VS should allow devs to create a new API project and select Auth Type (JWT or others) #42275
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943

PullRequests

Created

  • Log error when exception occurs during streaming #42283
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix SignalR Streaming example #42281
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix support for native AOT in minimal #42272
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/3.1] Redo `yarn install` #42173
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Sync shared code from runtime #42276
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Add missing @-sign on bot comment #42270
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Route Groups] Support AddFilter, WithOpenApi and other additive conventions #42195
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, feature-minimal-hosting
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • Use GetFolderPath(UserProfile) to obtain HOME dir #41865
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Make H2 WebSockets ignore MaxRequestBodySize and MinRequestBodyDataRate #42269
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • Unskip Playwright BlazorTemplates.Tests & Run on Helix #42266
    area-mvc, feature-templates, playwright 🎭

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor projects with specific names don't build #8156
  • Using a compatibility renderer for button on iOS causes crash #8153
  • Button is not disabled at start when BindCommad(...) is used after Bind(IsEnambledProperty,...) #8152
  • WinUi CollectionView is not recycling containers. #8151
  • Shadows not working on Windows #8150
  • Resolving an x:Reference in a RELEASE build picks the wrong element in some cases. #8149
  • MAUI Shell FlyoutContent Bug #8148
  • FlyoutHeader hangs ios application on startup #8146
  • DeviceDisplay.Current.KeepScreenOn = true isn't working #8145

Closed

  • .NET MAUI Button on Android #8139
  • Set dark icons for lightTheme #8143
  • Web Development #8144
  • IsVisible Not Render or Update from IsVisible = False to True. #8129
  • Search handler display inconsistent on android #6170
    6.0-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/graphics #8147
    area/drawing ✏️, do-not-merge

Merged

  • Remove the extra lines in the error message for better viewing #8069
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2

Updated

  • [Android] Fix issue using DynamicResource TextColor on Label FormattedString #7793
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix BackgroundColor property issue on SearchBar #7794
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue clipping RadioButton #7724
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
